wikipedia_page.main: Charles Barclay (2 October 1837 – 2 January 1910) was an English cricketer. He played two first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club between 1859 and 1860. He was educated at Harrow School for whom he played cricket.

response: *Alexander Charles Barclay (1823–1893), Liberal MP for Taunton (1859–1880) and brewerHarrow, 1800–1911, p. 162

* Charles Barclay (MP) (1780–1855), British brewer, politician and landowner
